Editor.js - Block-Style Editor

Editor.js is a block-styled editor that returns clean JSON data instead of heavy HTML markup.

Why Editor.js?

Editor.js takes a unique approach to content editing:

  • Block-based - Each paragraph, heading, or image is a block
  • Clean output - Returns structured JSON, not messy HTML
  • Extensible - Add custom blocks via plugins
  • Minimal and fast - No dependencies, lightweight core

Output Format

Instead of HTML, Editor.js outputs clean JSON data:

{
  "blocks": [
    {
      "type": "header",
      "data": { "text": "Hello", "level": 2 }
    }
  ]
}

Available Plugins

Many plugins are available for different content types:

  1. Headers and paragraphs
  2. Lists (ordered and unordered)
  3. Images and embeds
  4. Tables and code blocks
  5. Quotes and delimiters

"Editor.js is designed to be used in modern web applications where content quality matters."
